Hi all, I have created a workflow in which I have a step to send the internal email notification which have the link of a landing page with the query strings.. The query string has the the hubl values like *?0-2/domain={{ company.domain}}&0-2/name={{ company.name }}* and this works perfectly fine until the value dont have the special character in it. Means when the the value of one query string has '&' in it like companyname=A&B, it count only A there and seprate the value from & so do we have the solution to get the & counted in the name.?
Can anyone help me with this please?
